page.title: 08Shopping in Ditchingham
page.content: One of the shops in Ditchingham is the Post office which sells cigarettes,greeting cards,stationery & daily papers.Also on sale are toys for boys and girls.The Post office is a vital part of the village for the services it provides. There is a small CO_OP supermarket which sells genaral groceries,green groceries,meat & frozen food,baby food,bread,cakes & dairy products.Also cigarettes,soft drinks & wine. Another general store sells wool toys,groceries,green groceries,sweets, frozen foods & dairy food. Also in Ditchingham are a fish and chip shop,filling station & tyre service bay. For a small village Ditchingham is well served with shops.
